description.p: Your patron is the void, the absolute nothingness, the complete absence of existence, itself a concept so unintelligible that the mortal mind fails to comprehend it even on the most basic of levels.

description.p: The Void lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

description.p: At 1st level, you learn Deep Speech and your creature type becomes aberration as well as your original type.

description.p: At 1st level, You skirt the edge of non-existence making it harder for creatures to become aware of you. If a creature has interacted with you for less than 1 hour in the past 24 hours they have disadvantage when trying to recall information about you. Additionally a creature has disadvantage on perception checks to become aware of you.

description.p: At 6th level the void suffuses your being and reality slightly shifts around you. You gain resistance to cold damage. Additionally, you have a 15ft aura of darkness that you can summon around yourself that non-magical light can't illuminate. All creatures within this aura have their speed halved. You can summon or dismiss this aura as a bonus action.

description.p: At 10th level the laws of physics begin to fail to apply to you. You gain the ability to move up, down and across vertical surfaces and upside down without falling.

Additionally, when you move you can instead begin to fall in any direction of your choosing, you are immune to fall damage if you fall in this way. When you being to fall you can't change anything about your trajectory until you hit a solid surface.

description.p: At 14th level you can manifest a fragment of the void. While the aura granted by your Void Being feature is active, you can use an action to increase the range by 20ft and have that darkness become absolute so that magical light is also swallowed. All creatures that you choose take 3d8 cold damage and are blind and deaf whilst inside. These effects last for 1 minute or until you choose to cancel them. Once you have used this feature you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.
